body:
Jubby & Mustard? came up with this idea a while back but it never got much feedback, then I sprinkled a few ideas in.

There are X amount of minutes. There is 1 Obsidian block in the middle of the map, both teams are trying to break it and bring it back to their base. Although, the game is not over yet. Within those X amount of minutes, the other team is able to try and steal the monument from the other team and bring it to their base.
Everyone will have Diamond Pickaxes (Eff IV).
If the block is lost or thrown in the void, it shall respawn in the middle of the map once again.

Any feedback or suggestions are much appreciated.
body_tagged:

title: [Nebula GM Idea] GnR (Grab n Run)

replies.body: +1 This is a brilliant idea, though there should be something that prevents a team from winning if a player from said team is holding the monument at the time. The teams should only win if the block is in its specified location in one base and not in an inventory.
replies.body_tagged: +1 This is a brilliant idea, though there should be something that prevents a team from winning if a player from said team is holding the monument at the time. The teams should only win if the block is in its specified location in one base and not in an inventory.

replies.body:
I am bumping this topic (with a signature from senior staff) for more input on the gamemode. The suggestion seemed liked at first by Kylo and any further input would be great to have to develop this gamemode into a reality. This is one of the few plausible gamemodes that no servers have and it mixes 2 of our signature/concept gamemodes of Avicus into a really great platform for both players of both gamemodes to enjoy. I think this would be popular for both sides of the community, and with the positions and map styles I could see it happening.

Now, it's up to you all to make it a reality. I'd love to see some (well designed) maps and some thought into what you guys could turn this into. I would be excited to see this playing and if you have any YAML questions, I'd be happy to answer them, plus it'd be more motivation for the developers to try to add this. Post thoughts please!

replies.body:
Replying to this.
This is a good idea, but you should be able to edit the timer, depending on the map, and it's size.

Idea with this, the monument could be a time bomb. If it's still in your inventory after the timer runs out, it respawns to its original position, and the carrier is killed in the process.
replies.body_tagged:
Replying to this.

Idea with this, the monument could be a time bomb. If it's still in your inventory after the timer runs out, it respawns to its original position, and the carrier is killed in the process.

You should make it so that the obsidian auto spawns back in the middle after 1 minute.

replies.body: Not sure I said this already, but if the monument is dropped, it's coords will be broadcasted, and it's timed. If not picked up in time, it returns to its original position.
replies.body_tagged: Not sure I said this already, but if the monument is dropped, it's coords will be broadcasted, and it's timed. If not picked up in time, it returns to its original position.
